This|||paper|||presents|||a|||new|||system,|||called|||NetSolve,|||that|||allows|||users|||to|||access|||computational|||resources,|||such|||as|||hardware|||and|||software,|||distributed|||across|||the|||network.|||The|||development|||of|||NetSolve	TOKEN-Thispaperpresentsanewsystem,calledNetSolve,thatallowsuserstoaccesscomputationalresources,suchashardwareandsoftware,distributedacrossthenetwork.ThedevelopmentofNetSolve	a	T	Th	Thi	This	e	ve	lve	olve	thispaperpresentsanewsystemcallednetsolvethatallowsuserstoaccesscomputationalresourcessuchashardwareandsoftwaredistributedacrossthenetworkthedevelopmentofnetsolve	InitCap	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-This	a	T	Th	Thi	This	s	is	his	This	this	InitCap	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	TOKEN-paper	a	p	pa	pap	pape	r	er	per	aper	paper	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-of	a	o	of	of	of	f	of	of	of	of	others	nonNum	48	no	no	no	no	placeName	publisherName	others	TOKEN-NetSolve	a	N	Ne	Net	NetS	e	ve	lve	olve	netsolve	InitCap	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	header	<abstract>

's.	c's.	appearonlyintherecursiverulesbutnotintheics	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	stopPunct	TOKEN-appear	a	a	ap	app	appe	r	ar	ear	pear	appear	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	none	none	none	none	note-appear	none	none	none	none	none	TOKEN-only	a	o	on	onl	only	y	ly	nly	only	only	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-the	a	t	th	the	the	e	he	the	the	the	others	nonNum	32	no	no	no	no	no	publisherName	others	TOKEN-ic's.	.	i	ic	ic'	ic's	.	s. attribute.|||Such|||a|||situation|||could|||arise|||if|||both|||inputs|||to|||the|||join|||are|||intermediate|||results|||in|||a|||complex|||query,|||or|||in	TOKEN-attribute.Suchasituationcouldariseifbothinputstothejoinareintermediateresultsinacomplexquery,orin	a	a	at	att	attr	n	in	rin	orin	attributesuchasituationcouldariseifbothinputstothejoinareintermediateresultsinacomplexqueryorin	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-attribute.	.	a	at	att	attr	.	e.	te.	ute.	attribute	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	stopPunct	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	TOKEN-Such	a	S	Su	Suc	Such	h	ch	uch	Such	such	InitCap	nonNum	4	no	no	lastName	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-or	a	o	or	or	or	r	or	or	or	or	others	nonNum	4	no	no	lastName	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-in	a	i	in	in	in	n	in	in	in	in	others	nonNum	4	no	no	lastName	no	no	no	others	header	<abstract>

inputs|||into|||manageable|||chunks,|||and|||joins|||them|||using|||a|||computational|||geometry|||based|||plane-sweeping|||technique.|||This|||paper|||also|||presents|||a|||performance|||study|||comparing|||the|||the|||traditional|||indexed|||nested|||loops|||join	TOKEN-inputsintomanageablechunks,andjoinsthemusingacomputationalgeometrybasedplane-sweepingtechnique.Thispaperalsopresentsaperformancestudycomparingthethetraditionalindexednestedloopsjoin	a	i	in	inp	inpu	n	in	oin	join	inputsintomanageablechunksandjoinsthemusingacomputationalgeometrybasedplanesweepingtechniquethispaperalsopresentsaperformancestudycomparingthethetraditionalindexednestedloopsjoin	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-inputs	a	i	in	inp	inpu	s	ts	uts	puts	inputs	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	none	TOKEN-into	a	i	in	int	into	o	to	nto	into	into	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-loops	a	l	lo	loo	loop	s	ps	ops	oops	loops	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	TOKEN-join	a	j	jo	joi	join	n	in	oin	join	join	others	nonNum	0	no	no	no	no	no	no	others	header	<abstract>
